headline: S&P Global Declares Fourth Quarter Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) has approved a cash dividend on the Corporation's common stock for the fourth quarter of 2025. The dividend of $0.96 is payable on December 10, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 25, 2025. The annualized dividend rate is $3.84 per share.

headline: Stocks Are Back to Breakeven as Breadth Improves
summary: Don’t look now, but the stock market is back to breakeven. The Nasdaq Composite turned positive on Tuesday, while the S&P 500 was flat. The Dow was still down 89 points, or 0.2%. But breadth was improving slightly as the day rolled on: The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF was down just 0.

headline: 3 Reasons We Love S&P Global (SPGI)
summary: While the S&P 500 is up 16.5% since March 2025, S&P Global (currently trading at $544.40 per share) has lagged behind, posting a return of 10.1%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
